Q:
Which Day of the year has the highest Departure Delay?
(MMM DD, e.g., FEB 29)

Choose the correct option. The Arrival Delay is worst in-
A) First half of January
B) Mid July
C) Last half of December

Choose the correct option for the blank. Anyone traveling from LGA airport (origin) during ____________ has to suffer from the highest Departure Delays.
A) Early January
B) Summer
C) Late December

Find the busiest day of the year in ORD (origin) airport. The higher the Taxi Out time the busier the airport.
(MMM DD, e.g., FEB 29)

In the city of Chicago-IL (origin), inclement weather forces delays (weather delay) in the following period-
A) The first half of January
B) The last half of July
C) The last half of December

In the state of NY (destination), which day of the year suffers most from the delay caused by National Aviation System (NAS delay)?
(MMM DD, e.g., FEB 29)

In which day of the year, aircrafts suffer from the highest Taxi In time at ATL (destination) airport?
(MMM DD, e.g., FEB 29)

Flight carriers are responsible for higher Carrier Delay. On which day of the year will you avoid flying on AA (carrier) aircrafts.
(MMM DD, e.g., FEB 29)

Choose the correct option. UA (carrier) aircrafts have the worst Aircraft Delay statistics on-
A) Early January
B) Mid June
C) Late December

The day of the year that has the shortest Arrival Delay in the Year 2010 belongs to the which month?
(XXX, e.g., FEB)
